objects.text:
• Premium blush with built-in mirror
• Silky-smooth powder formula
• Luxurious silver & black packaging
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich color

product_details.name: Pretty in Pink Luxury Makeup Set - Timeless Beauty Essentials
product_details.description:
• Premium pink blush compact with built-in mirror for perfect application on-the-go
• Silky-smooth powder formula for natural, buildable coverage
• Luxurious silver and black packaging for elegant aesthetics
• Matching pink lipstick in sleek silver tube with professional finish
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich color coordination
• Professional-grade makeup essentials perfect for daily wear
• Classic black compact design with protective closure
• Travel-friendly size for your purse or makeup bag
• Perfect pink shades suitable for all skin tones
• High-quality mirror for precise application anywhere

banner_details:
The banner features a vibrant and youthful design that centers around a beauty and cosmetics theme. The headline (`heading`) showcases bold pink typography in all caps, grabbing attention at the top. Just beneath, the `subheading` presents an elegant serif font that reinforces the luxurious tone. The mid-section lists product features (`description`) in bullet points using a clean sans-serif font. A product image (`product_image`) visually balances the design on the right. The `price` is displayed prominently in large font, accompanied by a `cta_background` pink button with the white, capitalized `cta` text inviting action. A script-style `tagline` adds refinement and charm near the lower half.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink Background: `#FFF5F8`
- Accent Pink: `#FF4D8D`
- Text Pink: `#E03E7C`
- Circle Highlight Pink: `#FF9BBD`
- Grey Text: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a soft, feminine aesthetic dominated by shades of pink and black. The lipstick and blush both feature a delicate pastel pink color (#F4A8C1), lending a gentle and romantic appeal. The packaging utilizes sleek black (#1B1B1B) to convey elegance and sophistication, while metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the lipstick tube adds a modern, sleek contrast that catches the light. The mirror reflects the pink tones subtly, blending the colors harmoniously. A clean white background (#FFFFFF) enhances the visual focus on the product, highlighting key tones. Ideal banner palette: Pastel Pink (#F4A8C1), Rose Pink (#E78AAE), Black (#1B1B1B), Silver (#C0C0C0), White (#FFFFFF).
